parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to access the data

parameters.name: time_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is accepted when negotiation is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: booking_time
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for certain partners.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required params for shop APIs.

parameters.name: address_id
parameters.description: The identity of address. Retrieved from to toppling/api_booking/address_params

parameters.name: phone_time_id
parameters.description: Some booking requires may not detail you time or more proper time limit. In such cases, you need get booking proper time first and get correct time limit to arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
